actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-484, by Mr. Frost.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to S. 3. Upon the adoption of this resolution, S. 3 shall be considered as recommitted to conference.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 118.

official_title: Providing for the recommittal to conference of the conference report to accompany the bill (S.3) to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide for a voluntary system of spending limits for Senate election campaigns, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Recommits to conference the conference report on S. 3 (voluntary spending limits for Senate election campaigns).

titles.title: Providing for the recommittal to conference of the conference report to accompany the bill (S.3) to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide for a voluntary system of spending limits for Senate election campaigns, and for other purposes.
